ygData.subject: [The EverQuest Tavern] Re: Arcane Order Cap quest question
ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks for the link and trying to help but... The link doesn t have the info I need for this quest:( I am still puzzeled and seeking someone who has completed
ygData.messageBody:
Thanks for the link and trying to help but... The link doesn't have
the info I need for this quest:( I am still puzzeled and seeking
someone who has completed this quest. I have not found anyone on EQ
that has yet:( Thanks for trying to help and if anyone else can?
Please do because I would like to do this quest.

Mari

--- In theeverquesttavern@y..., Diedre Webb <mousy616@y...> wrote:
> http://www.eqtraders.com/location/find_pelts.htm
> --- magickal_mari <Magickal-Mari@c...> wrote:
> > I've had the same prob with one of my Char & have
> > spent weeks on this
> > thing & nothing??? I wish someone would answer
> > because I would like
> > to know about this myself:(
> >
> > Mari
> >
> > --- In theeverquesttavern@y..., azurezen
> > <no_reply@y...> wrote:
> > > I'm trying to do the Arcane Order Cap quest that
> > starts in the
> > > Enchanter/Mage/Wizard guild in S. Qeynos.
> > >
> > >
> >
> http://everquest.allakhazam.com/db/quest.html?quest=1966
> > >
> > > Has anyone here done this quest?
> > >
> > > I've killed a bunch of Rabid Wolves and I haven't
> > gotten a single
> > > Rabid Wolf Hide. I always get Diseased Wolf
> > Pelts. When I try to
> > > combine one of the pelts with the other stuff for
> > the cap it says I
> > > cannot combine them in an object of that type :(
> > > Do Rabid Wolves actually drop Rabid Wolf Hides in
> > Qeynos Hills? If
> > > they do, do they do it on the Quellious server?
> >
> >
>
>
